nodes.text: Tolar was a Human male and the king of Arrochar during the early Galactic Civil War. His wife was Queen Tiina, and their son was Prince Kaspar. A few months after the Battle of Yavin, it was agreed that Kaspar would marry Princess Leia, in return the Rebel Alliance would be able to establish a new homebase on Arrochar. Later on Tolar was murdered on orders of the leader of the Arrochar Militia, who planned to deliver the Rebels to the Empire.
